remarks: An upper bound for the cardinality of a disjoint indexed union, with explicit choice principles. ` B ` depends on ` x ` and should be thought of as ` B ( x ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)
statement:
iunfo.1 $e |- T = U_ x e. A ( { x } X. B ) $.
iundomg.2 $e |- ( ph -> U_ x e. A ( C ^m B ) e. AC_ A ) $.
iundomg.3 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B ~<_ C ) $.
iundom2g $p |- ( ph -> T ~<_ ( A X. C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
